jobsJson.descriptionPlain: As one of Gojek's product pillar, GoLife is the largest integrated lifestyle provider in Indonesia, providing beauty, cleaning, massage, automobile, as well as daily lifestyle services through our verticals i.e. goglam, goclean, gomassage, goauto, godaily, golaundry & gofix. We launched our own app in February 2017 and it has been growing rapidly well with over 3 million downloads up until now.
jobsJson.description: As one of Gojek's product pillar, GoLife is the largest integrated lifestyle provider in Indonesia, providing beauty, cleaning, massage, automobile, as well as daily lifestyle services through our verticals i.e. goglam, goclean, gomassage, goauto, godaily, golaundry & gofix. We launched our own app in February 2017 and it has been growing rapidly well with over 3 million downloads up until now.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Research, design, test, deploy and maintain high-performance Android applications which will be used by Gojek's customer and Gojek's partners
  • Analyzing user needs and software requirements to determine feasibility of design within time and cost constraints
  • Analyzing and maintaining product features defined by the product manager
  • Overseeing the writing of the program code and ensure the usability and stability of the app
  • Debugging and root cause analysis
  • Modifying existing software to correct an error, to adapt it to new hardware, or to upgrade interfaces and improve performance
  • Giving advice and coaching fellow product engineer

• Bachelor degree in computer science, software engineering or any related areas
  • 3+ years in building a robust application using Swift 
  • Knows perfectly on how to work using GIT
  • Knows a lot about scrum methodology
  • Good communication skill
  • Enthusiasm for collaboration with designers, product managers, QA engineers, and other engineers
